project1.title: Spotify BPM Buddy
project1.text1: The Spotify BPM Buddy Chrome Extension is the perfect tool to bring your jam sessions and music practice sessions to the next level. The extension allows users to adjust the tempo of their Spotify player to a desired input tempo (non-commercial use only).
project1.text2: Upon visiting https://open.spotify.com/ , users will automatically be redirected to authorize usage with their Spotify account. Product After reaching the Spotify web player, they will be able to access the Spotify BPMBuddy as an icon in the footer containing the Spotify player.

project2.title: Dual-Class Share Trading Algorithm
project2.text1: This algorithm takes advantage of an arbitrage between certain dual-class shares that hold nearly identical market caps. It identifies price discrepencies between publicly-traded shares in a dual-class structure and marks short/long orders via the Alpaca market API.
project2.text2: This project was designed as a learning project for the purpose of exposure into the process of developing trading algorithms. Any usage must be compliant with Pattern Day Trading rules, and failure to comply with these standards automatically flags the user's Alpaca client.

project3.title: REM-Clock
project3.text1: Have you ever wanted to optimize the sleep you get at night? Sleep therapists recommend waking from sleep after completion of a REM cycle; the REM-Clock sets an alarm that wakes up users after an input REM sleep cycle count to maximize restful sleep for users.
project3.text2: Once the source code is uploaded onto an Arduino Uno, the user must strap their finger into the heart rate monitor finger clasp. The LED panel will display important information regarding REM sleep cycle count, and the alarm will ring after the input REM cycle count has elapsed.

project4.title: Voice-Protect
project4.text1: VoiceProtect allows users to gauge whether audio files or live audio streams have been generated with AI by leveraging the Tortoise-TTS library. As deepfake audio scams are becoming more prevalent, reliable deepfake audio detectors will become increasingly relevant.
project4.text2: Upon visiting https://open.spotify.com/, users will automatically be redirected to authorize usage with their Spotify account. Product After reaching the Spotify web player, they will be able to access the Spotify BPMBuddy as an icon in the footer containing the Spotify player.

project5.title: AI - House
project5.text1: Ai-house is a three.js learning project that utilizes a GLTF model loaded into the web environment. The project was made as a website for AI @ Princeton, an organization focused on teaching students on campus about developments in the field of AI/ML.
project5.text2:
Link to live website:
backprop.cs.princeton.edu

project6.title: About
project6.text1: Hi! I am a sophomore at Princeton University pursuing a major in Computer Science and minors in Applied Mathematics, Statistics & Machine Learning, and Robotics & Intelligent Systems. I'm originally from the Chicago area (I love snow -- hence the mountains video playing in the back).
project6.text2: I enjoy approaching questions related to language processing from a computational lense. All things music, 3D graphics, programming, languages, and math are cool to me. My goal is ultimately to work in the field of machine learning research and development.
